original: 沛國譙縣人，曹操之子。因體弱多病早卒。在《三國演義》和諸多野史中，大多杜撰曹丕因曹熊沒有前來祭弔曹操而遣使問責，致使曹熊畏罪自縊。
text: Peiguo Qiao County, son of Cao Cao. She died prematurely due to frailty. In "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" and many wild histories, most of them make up Cao Pi's accountability because Cao Xiong did not come to worship Cao Cao, causing Cao Xiong to hang himself in fear of crime.
